test.c.rule: Rule 6: Enclose the statement forming the body of control structures (`if`, `else if`, `else`, `while`, `do ... while`, `for`) in braces.
test.c.description: Enclose the main function with a pair of curly braces to define its scope.
test.c.recommendation: Add opening and closing curly braces around the main function.

test.c.rule: Rule 25: Use K&R style for bracing; always brace even single-line statements.
test.c.description: Use consistent bracing styles throughout the code to ensure readability and maintainability.
test.c.recommendation: Add a pair of curly braces around the printf statement.
